00035  *      Functions Section

00038 static process_t * roundRobinSchedule()
00039 {
00040         static int lastTask;
00041         int i;
00042         
00043         lastTask = (runningProcess == NULL) ? -1 : runningProcess->pid;
00044         i = (lastTask + 1 == MAX_PROCESS ? 1 : lastTask + 1);
00045         while(i != lastTask)
00046         {
00047                 if( processTable[i].pid != -1 && processTable[i].state == READY )
00048                 {               
00049                         return &processTable[i];
00050                 }
00051                 
00052                 i = (i + 1 == MAX_PROCESS ? 0 : i + 1);
00053         }
00054         return initProcess;
00055 }
00056 
00057 process_t * rpgSchedule()
00058 {
00059         int procPos;
00060         
00061         procPos = checkWhatAreReady();
00062         increaseRPGCounter();
00063         processTable[procPos].rpgPrior = 0;
00064         /*processTable[procPos].rpgOld = 0;*/
00065         prevPro = procPos;
00066         return &processTable[procPos];                  /* If there isn't a process to be excecuted it return Idle(0) process */
00067 }
00068 
00069 process_t * getNextTask()
00070 {       
00071         process_t * proc;
00072         /*char *video = (char*)0xb8002;*/
00073         
00074         proc = (Algorithim == ROUND_ROBIN ? roundRobinSchedule() : rpgSchedule());
00075         /*while(1){
00076                 *video = (proc->pid + 30);
00077                 *(video + 18) = 'A';
00078         }*/
00079         return proc;
00080 }
00081 
00082 int checkWhatAreReady( void )
00083 {
00084         int i, proc;
00085         
00086         for( i = 1, proc = 0 ; i < MAX_PROCESS ; ++i )
00087         {
00088                 if( processTable[i].state == READY && processTable[i].rpgPrior >= MAX_RPG && processTable[i].priority > processTable[proc].priority )
00089                 {
00090                         if( i != prevPro )
00091                                 proc = i;
00092                 }
00093         }
00094         return proc;
00095 }
00096 
00097 void increaseRPGCounter()
00098 {
00099         int i;
00100         
00101         for( i = 1 ; i < MAX_PROCESS ; ++i )
00102         {
00103                 if( processTable[i].state == READY )
00104                 {
00105                         processTable[i].rpgPrior += evaluate(processTable[i].priority);
00106                         processTable[i].rpgOld++;
00107                 }
00108         }
00109 }
00110 
00111 void changeAlgorithimSchedule( void ){
00112         Algorithim = (Algorithim == ROUND_ROBIN ? RPG : ROUND_ROBIN);
00113         if( Algorithim == ROUND_ROBIN )
00114                 puts("Ahora esta corriendo Round Robin\n");
00115         else    
00116                 puts("Ahora esta corriendo RPG\n");
00117 }
